titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: The elections to the King's Scholarships were made and announced. I was distressed to notice that the three choir–boys – Davis, Abbey, and Morgan – were at the bottom of the examiner's list. I laboured at the Sermon for several hours in the afternoon. M
Quirk had to be rather hurriedly removed to Newcastle in order to be operated on for appendicitis.
